subject: Re: [junit] Running Junit tests with several JREs within another test
msgSnippet: ... Now how are you going to write a test case for that? :-) (only half joking) -- ﻿Elliotte Rusty Harold  elharo@metalab.unc.edu XML in a Nutshell 3rd
messageBody:
Kent Beck wrote:

> I checked with JUnit 4 and noticed that it doesn't call System.exit(), so
> that's something we need to fix.

Now how are you going to write a test case for that? :-) (only half joking)
